DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine behavioral treatment methamphetamine dependence .
DOC.brief_title: A Behavioral Trial Treatment Methamphetamine Dependence . - 1
DOC.detailed_description: To characterize meth . withdrawal symptom use multidimensional withdrawal questionnaire ; field test investigate effect use algorithm develop discriminate new use residual carry-over meth metabolites urine evaluate treatment response meth . user participation thrice weekly psychosocial protocol use `` platform '' future pharmacotherapy trial .
DOC.criteria: Male Female least 18 yrs age ; DSM4 diagnosis methamphetamine ( METH ) dependence ; willing comply study procedure ; verbalize understanding consent provide write consent willingness complete study procedure ; seek treatment METH dependence . Additional criterion available screen site .
